channel.title: Need Help making server.. you get admin for the server if you help
channel.description:
[glow=blue,2,300] :) Hello all, I wish to make a server it has been months I have been trying to create my own server. I would apreciate it if someone would please help me?[/glow] [glow=blue,2,300]
:|Thank you. :|[/glow]
-=-=-=-=-Also... I have tried doing this in many different ways... i have the sources... such as... santascape_v1.2, Battlescape_v.1, Project 2 [edit 1] (Tryscape)--- I have tried to open them... It comes up with this error
[glow=red,2,300]`The system cannot find the path specified. Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: server Press any key to continue . . .[/glow]-=-=-=-=-

item.title: Need Help making server.. you get admin for the server if you help
item.dc:creator: @eclipse245 eclipse245
item.description:
@eclipse245 wrote:

yes i agree…but i recommend using Pimpscape

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help making server.. you get admin for the server if you help
item.dc:creator: @militarykill militarykill
item.description:
@militarykill wrote:

The tut that was mentioned above was perfect for me. Jus Make Sure You Start Out Using TestScape Like It Suggest, And If You Want, Change From There…

P.S- READ THE TUT WORD FOR WORD! Or You May Mess Up & Get An Error. I Cant Stress That Enough

Read full topic
item.source: Need Help making server.. you get admin for the server if you help
